title: Check Status of Port-in Request
description: A customer who requested to port their number in yesterday is calling to check the status.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their pending port-in request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the active port-in request.

tasks.description: Inform the customer of the current status and the scheduled completion time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs the customer the port is scheduled to complete by 5 PM today.
